    name="my_admin_role",
    description="Grants full access to all management features within the cluster.",
    cluster=[
        "all"
    ],
    indices=[
        {
            "names": [
                "index1",
                "index2"
            ],
            "privileges": [
                "all"
            ],
            "field_security": {
                "grant": [
                    "title",
                    "body"
                ]
            },
            "query": "{\"match\": {\"title\": \"foo\"}}"
        }
    ],
    applications=[
        {
            "application": "myapp",
            "privileges": [
                "admin",
                "read"
            ],
            "resources": [
                "*"
            ]
        }
    ],
    run_as=[
        "other_user"
    ],
    metadata={
        "version": 1
    },
)
print(resp)
